sentences: is a German musician and composer, whose musical style is heavily influenced by his study of traditional instruments and musical techniques from Japan, India, South America, and other countries.

With the exception of his album The Music of Stones (1989), he plays all of the instruments on his recordings, combining styles from different countries and using the instruments in unprecedented ways in each of his pieces.

He has mixed instruments from around the world, or used whatever was at hand: stones, ordinary flowerpots tuned with water, and his voiceâ€”singing improvised syllables over ten years before others made this approach fashionable.
